summary: The widowed King Randolph enlists the help of his cousin to teach his daughters the proper royal etiquette. Instead, she bans all dancing in the palace. Can the twelve dancing princesses save the kingdom with their late mother's gift?
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Catherine O'Hara|Nicole Oliver|Jennifer Copping|Lalainia Lindbjerg|Kathleen Barr|Chiara Zanni|Adrienne Carter|Ashleigh Ball|Britt McKillip|Maddy Capozzi|Chantal Strand|Shawn Macdonald|Christopher Gaze|Garry Chalk|Peter Kelamis|Gabe Khouth|Mark Oliver|David Kaye|Jonathan Holmes|Rebeca Aponte|Lileana Chacon|Maria Jose Estevez|Melanie Henriquez|Edilú Martínez|Leisha Medina|Melissa Lyons
keywords: princess commoner love|germany|princess|cobbler the shoemaker|magical world
title: Barbie y las 12 princesas bailarinas
